short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you like strategy games? You play a cute little black ghost who as you would estimate, loves the darkness!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
He Likes the Darkness is a cool platform jumping game. You play a cute little black ghost who as you would estimate, loves the darkness!

The game starts of basic and you just have to jump across to different platforms. As you keep going the different worlds but, the challenges become progressively hard. Some levels include moving platforms and you must time your jumps perfectly! With 7 different worlds (each world contains 8 individual parts), this platform game will keep you entertained!

How To Play:

Use your keyboard arrow keys to move the ghost left and right, and to make him jump. You must get all the stars and coins on each level before processing to the next level.


Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! He Likes The Darkness - Strategy Games extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@zillakgames.com and share your thoughts and problems.
